introduction.tagline: Hi, I'm Sanjay K - a Full Stack & GenAI Developer.
introduction.summary: I love building real-world AI products and full-stack applications that solve practical problems. I'm currently pursuing B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at Kongu Engineering College.
introduction.about: I'm a full stack enthusiast and Generative AI developer with strong problem-solving skills. I enjoy turning ideas into working products - from backend APIs to clean, responsive UIs. I've worked on multiple AI + full-stack projects such as museum ticket booking chatbots, AI-powered quiz generators, and intelligent automation tools. I actively practice data structures and algorithms on LeetCode using Python and Java (over 200 problems solved) to sharpen my logical thinking.

education.institution: Vidhyaa Vikas Matric Hr Sec School
Vidhyaa Vikas Matric Hr Sec School

responsibilities: Developed an AI-powered quiz generator using Groq's LLaMA 4 for dynamic question generation
Integrated with Google Forms for secure assessments
Implemented proctoring features including tab-switch detection, face tracking, and speech monitoring
Built full-stack architecture enabling teachers to assign quizzes, track performance, and manage results

projects.name: Museum Ticket Booking Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered assistant and ticket booking bot for a museum that handles visitor queries and complete ticket booking workflow.
features: AI chatbot that answers visitor questions about the museum
Complete ticket booking workflow with seat/slot selection
Online payment integration using Razorpay
Automated ticket delivery via email
Location-based queries using OpenRouteService
Multi-platform support (WhatsApp and Web)
Real-time booking management with automated confirmations
projects.outcome: Demonstrates full-stack development, API integration, payment gateway handling, and practical use of LLMs in a real application scenario.

projects.name: AI-Powered Quiz Generating System
projects.description: A system that generates quizzes automatically from lecture materials and monitors test integrity using computer vision.
features: Upload PDFs/DOCX/TXT and automatically generate multiple-choice questions
RAG pipeline to retrieve relevant content and generate accurate questions
Automatic Google Forms creation and response fetching for evaluation
Proctoring features: tab-switch detection, face tracking, speech monitoring
Teacher dashboard for quiz assignment and performance tracking
projects.outcome: Automates quiz creation for teachers and improves exam integrity using AI and computer vision.

projects.name: AI-Powered Mock Interview Platform
projects.description: A virtual interview simulator with adaptive question generation, personalized feedback, and real-time performance evaluation.
features: Adaptive AI question generation based on responses
Speech-to-text integration using OpenAI Whisper
Face detection and proctoring for interview authenticity
ATS-based resume checking
Real-time performance evaluation and personalized feedback
Community discussions feature
Company insights extraction
projects.outcome: Helps candidates prepare for interviews with realistic AI-powered simulation and feedback.

projects.name: AI-Powered Photo Management Platform
projects.description: A facial recognition system for intelligent photo management with cross-folder search and Chrome extension support.
features: Facial recognition using MTCNN and FaceNet with 98% matching accuracy
CLIP model integration for text-to-image search capabilities
Google Drive API integration with OAuth 2.0 for cross-folder photo search
Photo tagging functionality
Chrome Extension for instant face-based photo retrieval
60% improvement in search speed
projects.outcome: Advanced photo management with state-of-the-art facial recognition and seamless cloud integration.

projects.name: Intelligent Multi-Agent Ecosystem for Task Automation
projects.description: A multi-agent system where each LLM agent handles a specific dataset or task, with a final aggregator model combining outputs.
features: Multiple specialized LLM agents for different tables/relations
Aggregator model that merges partial answers into final accurate results
User feedback loop for continuous accuracy improvement
Complex query handling through agent coordination
projects.outcome: Research-oriented project exploring coordination between multiple LLM agents for complex queries.

projects.name: LLM-based SQL Chatbot for Database Operations
projects.description: A chatbot that converts natural language into SQL queries for database operations.
features: Natural language to SQL query conversion
Support for search, insert, and delete operations
Book Ticket flow with availability checking and booking confirmation
End-to-end workflow automation
projects.outcome: Demonstrates practical use of LLMs for text-to-SQL and workflow automation.

projects.name: Event Management System
projects.description: A multi-role event management application for KEC College with payment integration and certificate management.
features: Student portal for viewing events, making payments, and downloading certificates
Club member interface for creating events and booking halls
Role-based approval system for club heads
Admin dashboard for hall availability management
Razorpay payment integration
JWT-based authentication
projects.outcome: Complete MERN stack application with role-based access control and payment integration.

projects.name: Streamlit ML App - Sentiment Analysis & Sleep Time Prediction
projects.description: A Streamlit web app combining sentiment analysis and sleep time prediction ML features.
features: Sentiment Analysis using NLTK preprocessing and Logistic Regression
Model tuning with GridSearchCV for better accuracy
Sleep Time Prediction using Random Forest Regressor
Clean, user-friendly interface
projects.outcome: Demonstrates end-to-end ML pipeline building, model tuning, and deployment.

competitive_programming.goal: Strengthen foundations for coding interviews at product-based companies

career_goals.short_term_goal: Crack top-tier company placements starting January next year
career_goals.career_objective: Eager to grow professionally in an innovative, future-focused environment while contributing to impactful projects.
